Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: It is therefore concluded that the R496H mutation of ARSA does not negatively influence the activity of ARSA and is not a cause of MLD

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| MLD (Mucopolysaccharidosis Type L4) |

In this paragraph, "MLD" is the only disease entity mentioned.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Mucopolysaccharidosis Type L4 (MLD) |

In this paragraph, only "Mucopolysaccharidosis Type L4 (MLD)" clearly refers to a disease. Other entities such as "ARSA" and "R496H mutation" do not refer to diseases but rather to the specific gene and mutation associated with MLD.
